note.p: Footman and domestic servant. At Down House. Son of Henrietta Emma Litchfield’s cook, Frances Johnson.
Census returns of England and Wales 1881 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG11/855/83/1).
Certificate of birth, 19 June 1857, St George’s, Hanover Square, Middlesex, and certificate of death, 22 November 1941, Bridge, Kent (General Register Office, England)
